queries.query: insert into user_profile (id, fbid, active, email, profile) values (?, 'A', ?, ?, ?)
update user_profile set profile = ? where email = ?
update user_profile set active = 'I' where email = ?
insert into event_log (id, fbid, event_type, event_data) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
insert into event_errors(id, fbid, event_type, event_data, reason) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert into enquiries(id, fbid, uid, email, contactNumber, fullName, propertyName, requirements) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select id, productId, productJson from product
select id, productId, productJson from product where productId = ?
select id, productId, popularity,styleSortSeq, productJson from product where category = ? ORDER BY popularity DESC, styleSortSeq DESC
select id, productId, popularity,styleSortSeq, productJson from product where subcategory = ? ORDER BY popularity DESC, styleSortSeq DESC
select id, productId, productShortJson from product where category = ? and styleId = ? and productId != ?
insert into product(id, productId, name, description, category, subcategory, styleId, productShortJson, productJson, popularity, relevance, styleSortSeq ) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update product set name = ?, description = ?, category = ?, subcategory = ?, styleId = ?, productShortJson = ?, productJson = ?, popularity = ?, relevance = ?, styleSortSeq = ? where productId = ?
insert into shortlisted(id, uid, email, productId, product) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from shortlisted where productId = ? and uid = ?
